original_body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); The Public Health Inspector's Union of Sri Lanka has reached a decision to resume dengue prevention duties.
The decision was reached following a discussion with the Minister of Health.
Secretary of the Public Health Inspector's Union of Sri Lanka Shanaka Bopitiya said PHIs are engaged in trade union action at present, based on several demands, including increasing allowances.
Online Safety Bill will curtail freedom, reveals a survey by Verité Research
Harnessing People’s Power | Prof. Savitri Goonesekere on the Talk of the Town
